album.title: Best of Ella Fitzgerald & Louis Armstrong

name: The Nearness of You
comments: @davidsmith...don't forget the greatest accompany...the oscar peterson trio...oscar peterson (p)...ray brown (db)...herb ellis (g)...joined by buddy rich (d)...
The greatest singer, singing a song by the greatest songwriter (Hoagy) with thegreatest trumpet player Louis. Perfection.
I thoroughly enjoy Ella and Louis!
never to be equaled quality here...ella & pops...superbly backed by oscar peterson and trio...
i could fall in love with the first man i'd see after hearing this...
Her voice on this one is like someone playing with your hair [x2]
Mmmm smooth like creamy coffee! One of my fave songs!
her voice on this one is like someone playing with your hair... :)
It's not like that I don't like their music just that this track is ...
